Membership

Become a Hogshead Member

Getting Started

Members really are the backbone of the Ranch. Nothing would get done without them!
As a member, we ask that you take an active role in not just the maintenance and the upkeep of the garden, but be a part of our community. We hold monthly membership meetings during the growing season, and all are encouraged to attend and share ideas.

Active Membership

Active Membership

Strong service component with the greatest benefits!

All levels include:
  • Get free entry to all events
  • Harvesting crops
  • Tool lending/borrowing privileges
  • Voice in decision making
  • private party access (for groups of 20 or less with prior approval)
Student
$20
per year
  • Six (6) Hours of Volunteer-work per month
  • Active participation on a minimum of one (1) committee
  • Hosting/Co-Hosting two (2) workdays/events per year
  • Attendance of at least three (3) membership meetings per year

$20 is tax deductible

Individual
$35
per year
  • Six (6) Hours of Volunteer-work per month
  • Active participation on a minimum of one (1) committee
  • Hosting/Co-Hosting two (2) workdays/events per year
  • Attendance of at least three (3) membership meetings per year

$35 is tax deductible

Family
$60
per month
  • Six (6) Hours of Volunteer-work per month
  • Active participation on a minimum of one (1) committee
  • Hosting/Co-Hosting two (2) workdays/events per year
  • Attendance of at least three (3) membership meetings per year

$60 is tax deductible

Corporate Patron

Corporate Patron

$250+ per year

$250+ is tax deductible

Join/Renew

Patron

Patron Membership

Ideal for those who can't make the service commitment, but still want to get involved!

All levels include:
  • Stay up to date through our newsletter
  • Receive an unique token of Thank You appreciation gift from the Ranch
Individual
$70
per year
  • Attendance of at least one (1) membership meeting
  • Attendance of at least one (1) volunteer event per year

$70 is tax deductible

per month
    • Attendance of at least one (1) membership meeting
    • Attendance of at least one (1) volunteer event per year

$120 is tax deductible
